title: Cherry and Chocolate Hot Cross Buns

ingredients.item: 450 g Waitrose Very Strong Canadian Flour
7g sachet McDougalls Fast Action Dried Yeast
2 x 80g packs Forest Feast Sour Cherries
100g pack Waitrose Cooks' Ingredients Dark Chocolate Chunks
250 ml semi-skimmed milk, plus 3 tbsp extra for the glaze
